Event.EventName: You've just come home from today's adventure.

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Go wash your hands before you do anything else.
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: You're glad you washed your hands, you never know what might be on them!

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: It's been a long day. Decide to sit down for a well deserved rest
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: In heinsight maybe you should have washed your hands... you can't quite remember what you've touched today.
